website_summaries.verdict: A modern styled, enhanced strength solution to your most common storage concerns, and it’s available at a good price.
pros: Includes sponge pads to protect door from scratching
cons: If you need a place to store a majority of your wardrobe, 5 simple hooks might not cut it

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: This hanger saves my doors! no more stickers and glue to my door, and they are made of aluminum. It's nice finish and material is strong to hold heavy or dual jackets. I like it, it's even better than Walmart stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple over-the-door hook-strip. Those I saw at hardware stores were flimsy and ugly. This one is perfect. It is simple, strong, good-looking. If you try it for a while and want to mount it permanently, you can do that with the adhesive strip they provided. Even without it, the hanger stay in place securely and did not make any noise when I open/close the door.. This is a simple object that is well-designed and that it exceeds the required functionality at no additional cost. It is an essential for dorm room
customer_reviews.author: Coco Kokiatso

customer_reviews.title: Nice for it's price
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife moved into a new home. And obviously we didn't where we can hang our clothes. We needed something which doesn't required much assembly. Just plug and play. So we found this and it turned out to be pretty nice hanger for clothes. Nice build, full metal and heavy. It doesn't move around a lot when we hang stuff on it. Would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: HarmanSS

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and quick
customer_reviews.text: The hook is very practical, the workmanship is good, the back cushion is very good, can protect my door.
customer_reviews.author: Make J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing addition to my bathroom. I haven’t used the stickers to stick them to the door and it still serves it purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Khadijah

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice, fits well, serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this. My only complaint is, I don't believe its description included some very important information: the measurements for where it would fit. This did NOT fit my intended location (a glass shower door) because there was not enough clearance between the door and what was directly above it, plus, my glass door was way, way too thin to work with this, even with the included pads. However, I found another location in my bathroom that, with the included spacing pads, worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Door gap wider than advertised. Much shorter than I expected, items are cramped.
customer_reviews.text: So, I didn't read the product dimensions and its a lot shorter than I would have hoped. It is just 13" long. It would be fine if you just hang towels or hoodies from it and want something compact. I bought it to hang my empty laptop back and backpack from it and they are seriously cramped as in the picture. Also, my door is 3-3/4 inches in width, which is what they recommend for the max width but I had to use both of the included spacers which give it almost another 1/4 of in inch so I wouldn't go much smaller than 3-3/4in but it would probably be safe to go thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cloud

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Does not properly fit any door. Presumably broken or poorly made. Closed the door GENTLY one time with this on it and one of the sides bent instantly and now I can’t even bend it back with a hammer! Much lighter than I thought it would be. Should be sold at the dollar store. Not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: kimcramer98

customer_reviews.title: Solid metal hanger, but doesn't fit most doors
customer_reviews.text: It's really sturdy and feels pretty well made. Unfortunately, it's a little too large to fit over most door frames. This means it can still work, but it will move around and make an annoying noise whenever you open or close the door. They do note in the product details that for the "best experience, we suggest to the doors from 1-1/2" to 1-3/4" (3.5cm to 4.5cm)," but that follows up saying that it fits all doors.
customer_reviews.author: Basher

customer_reviews.title: Not for coats; only for toddlers and infants clothes and small brushes. Hooks too close; too small
customer_reviews.text: If you want to hang toddler clothes or brushes etc it is fine. NO WAY it is meant for heavy duty clothes like coats. The hooks are too small and too close to each other. The frame is very light. I do not understand manufacturers' claim that it is for coats etc. RETURNING
customer_reviews.author: Brij

customer_reviews.title: Use the foam inserts provided...
customer_reviews.text: The first impression on gets is how light and potentially flimsy the product is. However; so far it has withstood everything I have “thrown” at it. If you decide to purchase it, make absolutely sure to use the foam infills that are designed to give a perfect fit regardless of the door’s thickness. They provide protection for the door and frame as well as giving the installation a more solid feel.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lardinois

customer_reviews.title: Durable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I used this to hang my daughter’s medals. Very durable. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hope this helps
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful hanger. But. I'm trying to think how to say this: the hanger didn't work for the door I ordered it for, but it worked perfectly for a different door. Even better. In my case...I wanted it to work on the back side of a closed door. Got that? But then the door wouldn't close. But for the front side of a different closed door, it worked perfectly. Who knew?
customer_reviews.author: M. T. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Stays on the place even without adhesion tape
customer_reviews.text: It's super easy to install. I just hooked it over my door. I didn't even use the adhesion tape because it stays there without that. And also if I don't use the tape then I can move it to some other door according to my convenience. I just have to push the door a little to close it, except that everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Shah

customer_reviews.title: It’s decent.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly displease with this product. It isn’t what I was expecting. Super small And I thought it would hang a little bit lower cause I am short but, it’s super high up so if your tall then it’s in your favor. But, in order for the hook to stay sturdy on the door and for it to close you have to stick on the one-sided stickers on the back of the hanger which looks a little tacky but, overall it does it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Hangs on a wide variety of doors with different sized spacers that give a better fit and protect your door from scratches. This was great for my application, but make sure you look at the dimensions prior to purchase, as the hooks are likely too close together for large, bulky jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and design
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I ordered two: for bedroom and bathroom. They come with instructions and a couple pads that is very helpful. I used almost all of them cause my doors turned out to be pretty thin, but it still worked fine. The hooks have a little bit of a matte finish, not glossy, which I like a lot. Very simple and stylish
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice the thickness and these hooks are intended for heavy duties. Bought them originally because I wanted some hooks in my bathroom for towel and clothes. Them ended up a bit thicker for my bathroom door and it caused unneccessary noises opening and closing the door if installed. Then I put it on my cabinet door over the kitchen sink. Now I get some cute hooks to hang my freshly-washed pots with! And because they are right above my sink, water won't get dripped all over my counter or floor! And they look great! What a nice surprise! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: yan ning

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: This was described as heavy duty. If you place two pieces of clothing on it, it would bend ( 2 shirts, two blouses, a dress and skirt). Don't even think of coat or jacket. I knew it was insufficient when I approached parcel, it was in an envelope in a flat white box! Really? Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not just too small, and the individual hangers are too small
customer_reviews.text: They metal hangers are like tiny rods. Hanging clothes on them puts all the weight into one tiny isolated spot. Hopefully the indentation into the fabric will go away! I think I'll scrap the individual hangers and DIY a traditional wooden board hanger with nice bulbous hardware that will look much nicer. Build quality is meh. Yes, this functions as you would expect, but it isn't the best value when you immediately want to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Jao

customer_reviews.title: Not overly impressed...
customer_reviews.text: The unit is a little on the small side. Some of the hooks are a little crooked, which doesn't bother me too much given that the unit will hardly be seen... overall I'm not overly impressed with the product, but I bought it on an impulse with an idea in mind...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Very Thin
customer_reviews.text: They look good - but they are made of very thin metal - and not really worth what they cost...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It's about half the size you might expect length-wise, but it works well
customer_reviews.text: I was hanging towels all over in my bathroom until I got this - works fine. The hooks are really close together and it's pretty short but hey it works. I'm thinking about buying another one because there is plenty of room to hang 2 on the back of one door. It comes with adhesive strips so it won't clank on the door as you open and close it. Overall I'm pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pernicious

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but sturdy. Stick-on pads keep it snuggly in place so it doesn’t scratch paint. Used this one on the door of my guest bathroom. Will probably get another for my husband’s closet door for belts and robes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: BWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Functional for 2 bath towels
customer_reviews.text: This comes with sticky pads to prevent scratching of the door and they also provide more stability. The hooks are close together, so two bath towels fit (one towel over 2 hooks). It would be too small for more than that. I like that it is small and does not detract from the bathroom decor. You hardly notice it when towels are hanging there.
customer_reviews.author: ALMT

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well built!
customer_reviews.text: All I did was added a couple felt tabs to the back side because our doors were recently painted. I would buy these again they are cute and sturdy compared to ones I had in my earlier years.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with look and function
customer_reviews.text: Needed extra foam that was provided for a thin door. Fits well. Sturdy; was able to put a heavy coat on one corner without other corner lifting. Looks good, doesn't feel cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I've purchased on here. Package includes enough padding to work with nearly any door you can think of. Item fits flawlessly and has never had a problem holding multiple jackets and a heavy backpack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to use, and reliable. I use it to hang up my dog’s leashes on the front dog and it’s been absolutely great. It fits perfectly on the door and is stable. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, but not ideal for short people.
customer_reviews.text: Not ideal for people unless they're really tall. I bought two of these and kept just one since I already stuck the foam padding given to fit our washroom door. I would have returned this if I hadn't done that.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very simple & easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I think it said it's stainless steel, so it shouldn't rust. It also comes with pads to prevent scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Lance S.

customer_reviews.title: Functional and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised that something so affordable works so well! My bathroom door is warped and uneven. I’ve tried three over the door hooks with no luck. This was the first product that worked. The adhesive stickers allowed me to adjust it to the shape of the door. I like that they are soft as well - no scraped paint! Also, the hooks are nice and deep so towels stay firmly on the rack. Plus the rack is not too wide so you can open and shut the door easily, even with multiple items on the hooks. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and made well
customer_reviews.text: Made very well and fits over standard bedroom door just fine. Padding strips that are including are nice in making it stable. Will buy another for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Denise S.

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. I like that it keeps its balance regardless of how you distribute the weight on the hooks. And it came with soft pads to keep it from clanging when the shower door is opened/shut.
customer_reviews.author: Amisam

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much.
customer_reviews.text: This coat hanger design is really awesome. I don't like nails to make a hole in the wall. It will look ugly if you don't put a hanger there later. This hanger can be hung directly on the door. I hung it on the door of my closet and it fits perfectly. The people who made this design are really smart.
customer_reviews.author: Marjory Robert

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this hanger. I've owned several in my life and they always moved around with my door. Was really annoying. I'm happy to say that this one doesn't, though. Definitely worth.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I am using this behind my bathroom door so I can hang up my gym bag and not have it lying on the ground. It came quickly in good condition. Easy to use and the padding helps protect the door
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of my towels constantly slipping off my old over the door hooks so I took a chance with this one. It works perfectly!! The hooks are super sturdy and made of thick metal. It took 2 seconds to install over the door with the included sticky pads to ensure a snug fit. And I've never had a towel fall since!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Great hanger!! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong, just ordered a second one to hold a few more cast irons! Update: got the second one! Saved me tons of space!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy E.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish design
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to install. It also provides some stickers to put inside in case the door size is not fit. I bought the black one. And the material seems not fade easily.
customer_reviews.author: Fionn Chu

customer_reviews.title: Good quality hook hanger. Extremely easy to install. Works with almost all doors.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality hook hanger. Extremely easy to install. Works with almost all doors. Leaves a bit of gap between the hanging hook and the door's surface if the door is thin.
customer_reviews.author: DS7

customer_reviews.title: Mom Life Appreciates the hooks that do not snap
customer_reviews.text: Great hanger can use it for all 5 of my boys. It holds backpacks and hoodies for each just fine. We use it on our coat closet by the door. I like how sturdy it is. I do not have to worry about them breaking a hook pulling stuff off the hooks so quickly. That has happened too many times with the cheap plastic ones!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Fenty

customer_reviews.title: Great for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. My door is thin and I needed to use multiple pads as fillers. It hangs on my bathroom door for towels and my robe.
customer_reviews.author: Dayanera Schealler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on bedroom door!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Fits over the door well thanks to adhesives. The door still shuts completely without any resistance!
customer_reviews.author: C. Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Great Hook
customer_reviews.text: A very well built over the door hook Has 5 hooks that will be great for hanging clothes and duty uniforms
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Took a little bit to make it fit.
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product, but was kinda difficult to get to stay on. I had to use every adhesive they supplied. But after that I've had it up for months and haven't had a single problem.
customer_reviews.author: Austin R.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, could be better
customer_reviews.text: Love them but they are really short so if you have a tall door you and you’re short you might have trouble reaching it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Very strong
customer_reviews.text: Strong enough to bear heavier weight. Great product, very suitable for my door. I am afraid it is not suitable, I have to return it, but it is very suitable, it will not slide back and forth. It looks great and of good quality. It will definitely be recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Zablan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Small...
customer_reviews.text: It's extremely small. We purchased it to go on our front door for jackets and we can get 3 (one being a 2t jacket) on their before it's overloaded. It would be great for just our baby's jackets but other than that it's not meant for families
customer_reviews.author: Ryan&Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: 5 hooks on here but I have a lot of heavy jackets so I end up using 3 because I’m nervous that it can’t hold up all the weight
customer_reviews.author: pargat singh

customer_reviews.title: good quality !
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our new home and this is been very useful in bathroom to hang our nightdress. It comes with door protector sponge that will allow thick hook bar to not leave marks on the door as well as on the door frame. Buildup quality is good. No need of drill or other tools.
customer_reviews.author: pmk203

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This door hanger does exactly what it’s meant to do. It was easy to install and comes with padded stickers to put on the backside so it doesn’t scratch up your door. I like the sleek silver design, makes it look really clean and not bulky looking. 1 small downside is that it’s smaller than I expected. It looked bigger in the picture. Other than that, it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and is sturdy enough for what I need. I think it could hold a good amount.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: It's an affordable and attractive way to organize. I have a robe in the bedroom, etc., and another belt and harness for the laundry door. My doors are white, so there are white doors, and when you look at them, they are not that striking or attractive
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Belle

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Could be a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: Well made & does the job. There were no screws in the box for the installation but i had plenty on hand. Included foam pads enable it to be installed on an interior door without rattling. Still recommend securing it with screws from the top.
customer_reviews.author: charles e. ratjen

customer_reviews.title: Good over the door hooks.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any problems with this product so far. Using in baby's room to hang towels, nursing cover, and wet bag with soiled prefolds. Easy to install and am still able to close the door.
customer_reviews.author: S. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: ACMETOP Over The Door Hook Hanger-Heavy Duty Organizer For Coat, Towel.Robe-5 Hooks
customer_reviews.text: This is a very Nice over the door Hanger for your Coats, Hoodies, Towels- Perfect item for our RV Just a little on the Spendy Side But worth it!! Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hose

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stuff. Definitely a solid buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have installed the hookset over my bathroom door. It is so strong and sturdy, I was definitely not expecting such great quality at such a reasonable price. It fits perfectly in the size of the door and is extremely well designed to balance the weight as well. It has a glossy touch which makes it look very nice as well. I would recommend people to buy this product. It is 100% value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Shreyash

customer_reviews.title: Great door hook
customer_reviews.text: This door hook is very strong, the size is very standard, the appearance is simple and elegant, the price is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Really light in construction. Cheaply made but it is functional. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: TangelaP

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Product
customer_reviews.text: The product is very easy to install and holds a good amount of clothes and other accessories. It completely fits the gap between the door and the wall, making sure that the door closes properly. Nice Product. Must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Chauhan

customer_reviews.title: Metal
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly how it looks in the picture. Simple and small. I was liking for simplicity.
customer_reviews.author: glenda cortes

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Hung on bathroom door for heavy robes. Very sturdy. I did not use adhesion
customer_reviews.author: Sa-Rah Bibbins

customer_reviews.title: Great for any thinkness of door.
customer_reviews.text: Love that they included the foam stickers to help fit the thinner older doors. Fits perfectly with the added foam stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for house use
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase! The price is really affordable and the product itself is a great plus. You just have to hang on your door, and that's it!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: I love this door hanger!
customer_reviews.text: I love this door hanger! It is sturdy and well made, and it is so cute! It does a great job of holding our coats, jackets, and bags. It isn't welded together like a lot of other door hangers, so you won't have to worry about it breaking. The hooks that go over the door are quite thin, so most doors should be able to shut with this hanging on it.
customer_reviews.author: xiaoling

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing and at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! I looked at a lot of different over-the-door hook hangers, I needed one to go over my bifold closet door worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: ideal for camper
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our camper bathroom door. Very sturdy and looks nice. The width is just right for our smaller width door, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sara  M

customer_reviews.title: Good, but over priced.
customer_reviews.text: It’s works just fine, but it’s a lot smaller than I expected, and I feel like I paid way too much. Bought this too quickly, wish I looked around for something cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great door hook rack
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and solid. By using the included padding it fits the door perfectly. I use this to hold my backpack and hoodies in my office. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly on our door and even though it only has five hooks we easily hang twice that number of coats on it. It's very sturdy and since we have it on a closet door in the corner it's discreet and fits in great.
customer_reviews.author: Amadine

customer_reviews.title: Strong Door hook
customer_reviews.text: This is strong door hook and it is strong. They come with pads to put behind the hook so it doesn't make any noise.
customer_reviews.author: Prem Acharya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Exactly what I needed! Had to use all of the adhesive for the perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved it! I bought it for work and everybody was able to hang their stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Chemojewels

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hang my wet coats over the door. The thickness is just right for it to hold good as well as for the door to not get jammed. Serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my jackets and hats. Either my door is too narrow or the over hooks are too big but I needed more adhesives than what was given. Luckily I had extra command strips laying around. Other wise it is very nice and does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: Alex W Baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I was expecting but holds a LOT of stuff. Fits perfectly on the door and isn't hard to close or open when it's on there. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ronia

customer_reviews.title: My ring got stuck on the hook!
customer_reviews.text: The hooks were not that long so they were a little too high for me. I had to jump to get my coats on. The ring on my finger got stuck on a hook and I almost lost my finger!! The ring bended and I had to get stitches because the ring pulled my skin off my finger. The hook is also bent.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Manall

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product is as advertised. These days, that's all one can ask for and appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Good material and valuable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hanger for my bathroom. I have nowhere to hang my clothes and towel in my bathroom, and this hook slove my problem, and it saves the space as well. This hook is strong and valuable, and I bought another one for my parents.
customer_reviews.author: Kada

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: So, when I bought this I want to hang things in my door, but that wouldnt work because of the design. It wasnt bad but, it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: wiseguy

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Great for over our door to the garage! Fits great and gives a lot of room for coats
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Nordin

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and fits snug on the bathroom door. Has cushions inside to adjust accordingly to door thickness. Also the brushed metal looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is holding up one very heavy thick robe and three smaller light weight robes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie L.

customer_reviews.title: This does the job it is intended to do. ...
customer_reviews.text: This does the job it is intended to do. My only wish is that it had rubber tips on the ends of the hooks. I hang towels on it and they tend to slip off. If there were rubber tips, this wouldn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Primm

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't slide or leave any marks on your door.  Happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and has worked perfectly for our bathroom door. Great price for it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Organizes hair dryer and flat iron nicely on back of door. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a couple of weeks. Seems durable and a nice and practical addition to the room.
customer_reviews.author: WY

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Put two of these in my daughter closet. She like to hang everything and these have held up.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B.

customer_reviews.title: All Around Great
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described, very sleek and simple design. Comes preassembled (which apparently is asking a lot for some other sellers), and with a small bag of different thickness adhesive strips, in case it’s too wide for your door. Two of these fit on one door, which is great! Super happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: This hanger fit perfectly on my closet door and the scratch guards help keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: HAJ

customer_reviews.title: Mid quality
customer_reviews.text: Not as big or sturdy as I hoped but does hold lots of things like coats, backpacks etc
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Beach

customer_reviews.title: Double check how low it hangs down.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is closer to the top, be sure to check the measurements before buying
customer_reviews.author: Jacky Woo

customer_reviews.title: prefect
customer_reviews.text: This hook fits well behind the door. Can be very convenient to hang coats. Not taking up space
customer_reviews.author: Ekeaky

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: just looks& feels cheap, hangs everything fine but i’m waiting for it to break
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella M

customer_reviews.title: Install in minutes
customer_reviews.text: The door hook hanger is lightweight. There are sponge pads to adjust the width, and there are small sponge pads to prevent scratching your door.
customer_reviews.author: CELENENA

customer_reviews.title: good quality but size too small
customer_reviews.text: good quality but size is smaller than usual door hook hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Good quality and weight light. It is exactly what I expect. Size is perfect. It wont break my door. The prize is also beautiful. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ran Guo

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I put it in the back of my door for hanging up my towels and other stuff, it is great. I love it
customer_reviews.author: wanglei77

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for large towels. Very sturdy. I recommend these for bathrooms or any room that a hanging rack(over the door) is needed. Convenient, made of durable metal with protective covering to ensure rust free if hanging wet towels or clothing. .
customer_reviews.author: Jay

product_meta.title: Over The Door Hook Hanger by ACMETOP, Heavy-Duty Organizer for Coat, Towel, Bag, Robe - 5 Hooks, Aluminum, Brush Finish (Silver)
feature_bullets: 6063 Space Aluminum Alloy, same as iPhone back cover, Light-weight & Durable & Rust-resistant
Easily add convenient storage hooks and make use of un-used door space, no mounting hardware required. Ideal for bedroom bathroom closets for purses, scarves, clothes, jackets, towels...
Width * Height * Thick: 13 * 5.9 * 1.77" / 33*15*4.5cm. Fits standard doors up to 1-3/4" (4.5cm) thick. NOTE!! For best experience, we suggest to the doors from 1-1/2" to 1-3/4" (3.5cm to 4.5cm)
Simple Style & perfect details: Neat appearance with brush finish. Specific process keeps everywhere smooth, prevent from scratching.

High Quality & Durable: Differ from others, made by 6063 SPACE ALUMINUM and anodic oxidation process, same as iPhone back cover. Featuring light weight, sturdy and never rust. Hanging weight up to 45lbs. 12 months free replacement if any dissatisfaction.

Including: 1 x Over door hook hanger, 8 x Round little sponge pads, 4 x Rectangle sponge pads. NOTE: For perfect closing the door with this rack, be sure there enough gap over your door: above 1.5mm (a coin thick).
